testsuite.name: com.kitano.cli.CommandFactoryTest

testcase.name: when createCommand with encrypt string option and no password
test createCommand with encrypt string option and no algorithm provided
test createCommand with encrypt string option and provided password
when createCommand has no argument the function execute is not called

testsuite.system-out:
usage: KtxGuard -a <ALGORITHM> [-d <FILE>] [-df <FILE>] [-e <FILE>] [-ef <FILE>] [-h] [-l] [-o <FILE>] -p <PASSWORD> [-qr] [-r] Do something useful with an input file
-a,--algorithm <ALGORITHM> The algorithm to use for encryption/decryption. -d,--decrypt <FILE> Decrypts a string. -df,--decryptFile <FILE> Decrypts a file. -e,--encrypt <FILE> Encrypts a string. -ef,--encryptFile <FILE> Encrypts a file. -h,--help Prints this help message. -l,--list Lists all available algorithms. -o,--output <FILE> The output file to write to. -p,--password <PASSWORD> The password to use for encryption/decryption. -qr,--qrcode Generates a QR code from the public key. -r,--random Generates a random password.
Please report issues at http://kita.no/issues
